title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The tech world should abandon minimalist design in favor of more ‘expressive’ options says Samsung’s first Chief Design Officer, Mauro Porcini
items.description: He pointed to industries like fashion, automotives and architecture, which offer consumers a range of design options.

items.title: Tech stocks linked to Bitcoin take a battering as crypto traders brace for Strategy to breach danger threshold
items.description: The leading Bitcoin treasury company's stock market cap is now worth less than the Bitcoin it holds.

items.title: ‘The Fed went to sleep’ says top economist Mohamed El-Erian, who wants to see the central bank reformed and presidents to ‘cool it’
items.description: Mohamed El-Erian calls for a visionary, less reactive Fed just as Trump settles on his next chair, with Hassett leading and independence fears resurfa...

items.title: Warren Buffett used to give his family $10,000 each at Christmas—but when he noticed how fast they were spending it, he started buying them shares instead
items.description: Something to consider as the $83 trillion inheritance wave kicks in.

items.title: 2026 will be the year of AI monetization, says Wedbush’s Dan Ives
items.description: Most forecasts indicate that both enterprise and overall global AI spending will rise.
